patthana15.16:4.1: Hetuṃ maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.16:5.1: Hetuṃ maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.16:6.1: Hetuṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
